item.description: The excerpt discusses coding standards highlighted in "Rock Your Code: Coding Standards for Microsoft .NET," emphasizing the pitfalls of using numerous public fields in a class. It advocates for strong typing, proper encapsulation, and input validation to enhance object integrity. The author underscores the importance of self-documenting code for maintainability.
